entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow or rain near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
